title: GIVE US BACK SPIRIT OF THE ANCIENT GOLEM
body:
Now then let's think for a moment, they removed an item that offered 10%cdr, 500HP, 25%bonus HP, a ward, and a gold passive: for 500HP and tenacity.
Now most junglers who will build the HP jungle item would usually be building merc boots anyway so this change really isn't all that helpful. Personnaly i would pick the old ancient golem over every smite combined plus the health upgrade. It was a core item on every utility jungler, if you have 6 items and u wanted to remove golem for randuins, the golem actually gave you more HP overall.

Obviously riot ain't gona scrap the idea however I propose the removal of the tenacity from the health upgrade and simply throwing in ancient golems old stats, primarily the 25% bonus health. The ward, CDR and gold boost weren't crucial and we already get gold from the smites.

Post your thoughts on which health jungle item you'd prefer, and you all know where I stand
ANCIENT GOLEM FTW~
